name: Bhavana !!
wishText: Wishing you the best. Stay strong, stay happy ✨ ;)
text1: And you have successfully completed 25 years!!
textInChatBox: Hey Bhavana, Congratulation on your birthday!! Happy 25 ✨.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: This is a memorable day for you!
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
